import React from "react"; import logo from '../images/ailimits.png' import i18n from 'i18next'; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; export default function AILimitsLayout() { const { t } = useTranslation(); return (
{/* Navbar */}

{t('header.about')} {t('header.catalog')} {t('header.reviews')} {t('header.contact')}
{/* Hero Section */}

Empower Your
Vision with AI

We provide cutting-edge AI solutions to help you see beyond limitations and achieve your goals.

); }
